alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:59PM EST until December 18 at 8:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...1 1/2 to 2 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level is likely in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. Locally 3 ft of inundation above ground level. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Widespread flooding (up to 2 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level) of vulnerable areas is expected near the waterfront and shoreline, including roads, parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront. Locally 3 ft of inundation above ground level. Numerous road closures are likely, and vehicles parked in vulnerable areas near the waterfront will likely become flooded. Flooding will also extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Large breaking waves of 8 to 12 ft along the Rockaways and 12 to 16 ft along Long Island ocean beaches will result in widespread beach flooding and dune erosion. Scattered overwashes are likely where dune structures are compromised, causing flooding of roadways and vulnerable structures behind them. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Water levels are declining but are still in moderate levels of coastal flooding. The water levels are expected to continue to recede and are expected to go below moderate level thresholds of coastal flooding this evening. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/01 PM 3.5/ 4.0 1.9/ 2.3 2.2/ 2.7 2 MODERATE 19/02 AM 1.5/ 2.0 -0.2/ 0.3 0.4/ 0.9 1-2 NONE 19/03 PM 1.3/ 1.8 -0.3/ 0.2 0.0/ 0.5 2 NONE 20/04 AM 1.2/ 1.7 -0.5/ 0.0 0.0/ 0.5 1 NONE 20/04 PM 1.2/ 1.7 -0.5/ 0.0 0.0/ 0.5 0 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
